summary: This document is an email from an individual to an unnamed recipient regarding difficulties submitting a study application and requesting assistance from Jeffrey Epstein. The sender asks the recipient to convey messages to Jeffrey, including a request for him to call and to book a flight back to New York for February 27, 2007.

persons.name: Jeffery
persons.context: The sender repeatedly asks the recipient to relay messages to Jeffery, including checking on an application plan, providing a phone number, and booking a flight. The sender also asks to give Jeffery their 'SA number'.

connections.description: The sender is seeking Jeffery's assistance with a study application and travel arrangements, indicating a dependency or support relationship.

events.title: Planned flight to New York
events.description: The sender requests a flight to be booked back to New York for this date.

events.title: Email sent regarding application issues
events.description: The sender emails about being unable to submit a study application online due to technicalities and seeks Jeffery's help.

keyFacts: The sender is experiencing difficulties submitting a study application and seeks intervention from Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender requests Jeffrey Epstein to call them as soon as possible on a provided number.
The sender needs a flight booked back to New York for February 27, 2007.
The sender asks the recipient to give Jeffrey Epstein their 'SA number', which may be a student or identification number.
